## Feature Selection

```{r}
rfeCtrl <- rfeControl(
    functions = rfFuncs,
    method = "cv",
    seeds = seeds
)
```

```{r}
subsets <- c(1:5, 10, 15, 20, 25)
```

```{r}
set.seed(1056)
rfProfile <- rfe(
    x = train.dv[, -c(1, 331)],
    y = train.party,
    sizes = subsets,
    rfeControl = rfeCtrl
)
```

```{r}
rfProfile
```

```{r}
lmCtrl <- rfeControl(
    functions = lmFuncs,
    method = "cv",
    seeds = seeds
)
```

```{r}
set.seed(1056)
lmProfile <- rfe(
    x = train.dv[, -c(1, 331)],
    y = train.party,
    sizes = subsets,
    rfeControl = lmCtrl
)
```
